title: Executive Manager - Enterprise Architecture
description: When the company was growing (reaching 300 employees), its internal structure and processes must be adjusted to the new scale. As an Executive Manager, I was responsible for developing architecture capabilities of the enterprise. Together with the team I was planning and introducing changes that covered organization structure, internal processes as well as the architecture of systems under development. The implementation has brought tangible benefits in terms of improved communication, higher staff skills, improved system's architecture and more focus on long term planning.

details.title: See key responsibilities
items: Defining the strategy for systems development within the company
Work with business and IT stakeholders to align architecture vision with business goals
Coordinating technical aspects of projects carried out across the company (300 employees)
Introducing standards and guidelines related to architecture governance
Developing architecture capabilities of the company
